#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

inline int rev(int n)
{
    int s=0,r;
    while(n)
    {
        r=n%10;
        n/=10;
        s=10*s+r;
    }
    return s;
}


int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);

    while(t--)
    {
    int n,i;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for (i=0;;i++)
    {
        if (rev(n)==n){printf("%d\n",n);
        break;
        }
        n++;
    }
    }

    return 0;
}
